segments.text: Our unit is participating in a fundraiser this weekend and would like to borrow the van , if possible .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would need to check on that . Where is the fundraiser ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It will be at the beach by the pier .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What day will you need it for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We will only be needing it for Sunday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe that could work . I need to know who will be driving it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The only two drivers will be Mary and I .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If I give you the keys to the garage , could you bring it back on Sunday evening ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . We also would like to use the chairs from the lunchroom . Would that be OK ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , but make sure that everything is back by Sunday night at the latest .
segments.speaker: S2
